column1: length, angled away, defended to point
length, angled away, takes a few steps forward and guides it to third-man. Very little pace on offer, by the look of it
full on middle, hint of movement back in and defended to midwicket
full on middle, Rahul nearly turns the face too early, but the leading edge trickles along the ground to cover. Again indication of the lack of pace here
length outside off, has a tentative poke and misses
length outside off and beaten. Bit of extra bounce but also stopped on the batsman a little
length outside off, hint of that natural outswing that he gets, Rohit waited for it and steered it to third-man
length, angled in, tucked away past short fine-leg and the timing ensures that it races across the turf and into the boundary, leaving the fielder no chance after he was beaten
length outside off, steered to third-man
length outside off, punched off the middle of the bat but straight to cover
length outside off, steered to third-man, there was an initial call for two but the eventually decide against it
length, drifting into the pads, and Rahul, on return couldn't have been happier. Cashes in with another clip down to fine-leg
length on middle, Rohit presents a straight bat and a high elbow to loft him over mid-on and the fielder races after, dives to save two on the boundary
length on middle, defended

the short fine-leg shows great anticipation and takes a simple catch in the end!. Rohit goes for a premeditated scoop, it doesn't quite come onto the bat, he doesn't get all of it and ends up spooning it to short fine-leg, who was ready for it before the shot was even completed
length outside off, steered to point
length on middle, Kohli skips down the wicket and defends back to the bowler
length outside off, Rahul picks it up one-handed over the cover field and it nearly carries all the way
length, nips back in a little, pushed to mid-on and they scamper one
length on off, down the wicket comes Kolhi to try and blast him through the covers, only gets a thick inside edge near his feet
length outside off, steered to third-man
slower ball outside off, and this time Rahul controls the shot over cover but times it as well as the one earlier in the over for another four
full outside off, pushed to mid-off and the fielder was hanging on his heels, which allows an easy single
length outside off, steered to third-man
full on middle and Kohli blasts it past the bowler, down the ground for his first boundary
length outside off, steered to third-man
full outside off, opens the face and steers it to third-man
slashed and slashed over point. It was length outside off, too much width and Kohli pounced on it
length outside off, tighter line though means that Kohli can only steer it to third-man
the famous flick of the wrists and over squareleg for four! Full on middle, picked up through squareleg in time honoured fashion
length outside off, steered to third-man
short and pulled but a few bounces and straight to deep backward squareleg
slower ball outside off, steered to third-man
length on middle, pushed to cover, Rahul wants the single but Kohli sends him back
length outside off and Rahul keeps peppering the cover and point region with these beautifully timed lofted strokes
length on middle, pushed to long-on
length outside off, slightly quicker, tries to use the pace and beat short third with a reverse sweep
down the wicket, finds the right length and hammers it past the bowler
short this time, Rahul was ready for it, rocks back and pulls but straight to deep midwicket
short on middle, Kohli whips it away to deep squareleg
quicker one but way down the leg side, Good take from Handscomb
quicker one outside off this time and called wide
quicker one from the front off the hand again, Rahul cuts but can't beat the diving short third-man
length on middle, tucked away to deep backward squareleg
length outside off, extra bounce, Kohli rides it and steers it to third-man
short and pulled off the frontfoot well in front of square but only for one
length, angled in, Rahul backs away to go through the off side but misses
length on middle, flicked to deep backward squareleg and they quickly turn for the second to make it with ease
down the track and bursts through the hands of the cover fielder for a couple
full on middle, swatted past the bowler, who got a hand to it
down the wicket comes Rahul, Zampa sees him coming early and fires it in on middle, Rahul adjusts and pushes it to deep midwicket

down the track, gets to the pitch but flicks it aerially straight down long-on's throat. Zampa got a hint of drift which perhaps resulted in Kohli dragging the ball to the leg side when he may have preferred going straight over the bowler's head
full outside off and Pant hammers it down the ground where the long-off makes a good tumbling save
down the wicket and Rahul goes through the line, over the bowler's head for a maximum. He got the length and it was also the straighter one
length, angled in, helped along the ground to deep backward squareleg
short on middle, hurries onto him as he shapes to pull, pushes it down the ground, in the end
length outside off and beaten by the lack of bounce
length outside off, he's bowling them quite quickly, much like Michael Bevan, pushed to cover

Pant has run himself out after a brilliant piece of fielding! quicker one outside off, Pant skips down the track and cuts it off the middle of the bat but makes the mistake of running with the shot before it had beaten the diving fielder, who quickly gathered himself and lobbed the ball to the keeper to find him well short. Helped that it was to Behrendorff's right side, which is his left
length, angled in, tucked away to deep midwicket
length outside off, Dhoni has a slash and misses

full outside off, squirted past point and Dhoni takes on the third-man fielder and manages to complete it as the keeper couldn't gather the throw, which was quite poor. That's a runout opportunity missed
short on middle, Rahul swivels and helps it along to fine-leg for one
full on middle, flicked to deep midwicket
full on middle, pushed past midwicket
full on middle, bit of a leading edge, the ricochet off the stumps goes to cover but they don't get a run
that's Rahul's fifty on return to the side. length on middle, pushed to squareleg
another tight two completed but could have been close at the non striker's end but the bowler wasn't behind the stumps to gather
length outside off, skips down the wicket and steers it to third-man

Rahul backs away to go through the off side but the bowler does well to follow him, cramping him for the room he was trying to make and he only gets it off the bottom of the bat to spoon a simple catch to mid-off
back of a length and outside off, stabbed back to the bowler off the back foot
shorter and outside off, worked off the back foot to deep midwicket
just short of a good length and outside off, punches to deep point with an open face

Coulter-Nile barges through the defences of Karthik. He dares to shimmy down the pitch, Coulter-Nile hits a hard length and gets it to move back in slightly. Karthik, having left his crease, misses it altogether and is bowled through the gate.
pushed through on middle, slides on and Dhoni defends off the back foot
Dhoni ventures down the track, Zampa hurls it at leg stump. Jabbed away to the midwicket region
tossed up on leg stump, Krunal pats it to cover off the front foot
pushed through outside off and Zampa finds extra bounce, Krunal does not connect with a reverse-sweep
flatter and darted at the pads, whipped to short midwicket off the back foot
dropped short and outside off, Krunal gets back and cuts straight to point
back of a length and outside off, keeps low and messes with Dhoni's cut. Beaten
short and outside off, slapped off the back foot to sweeper cover
on a length and at the hips, whipped with the wrists to long leg
on a length on middle and leg, Dhoni shovels it away to the right of long-on
back of a length on off, slower cutter, patted to the covers for one. India reach 100

Spliced in the air to Maxwell at backward point. Back of a length and outside off, the ball does not come onto the bat either, Krunal aims a pull over midwicket but ends up spooning a catch to Maxwell
just short of a good length and outside off. Picked off to long leg, where a fumble allows Dhoni to get back on strike
short and skids back in to cramp Dhoni for room. Tucked away to midwicket
short and angling in at the top of off, no room for Dhoni to free his arms, stabbed back to Richardson
short at the body, Dhoni goes on the back foot and pulls a single to long leg
short and slanted in, Umesh plays around his front pad and misses the leg-side flick. Off the pad and the ball rolls to square leg
short and at top of off, draws a back-foot defence to cover
length, angled in, Umesh shuffles across, misses the leg glance and it's called wide
full outside off, Umesh shuffles again, pushes it to mid-off for a quick single
length outside off, Dhoni slaps it to deep cover for one
length outside off, Umesh shuffles and turns the face early, gets a leading edge, along the ground to third-man
length outside off, slashes away to third-man's right but unable to beat him
shuffles across and this was waiting to happen. Caught plumb in front to a straight, quick ball at 144 kmph and doesn't even bother to review it
full on the stumps and he manages to keep it out, albeit awkwardly
length on middle, pushed to long-off, Dhoni refuses the single
length on middle, pulled to midwicket, Dhoni is forced to refuse another single
length on middle, spliced to midwicket but just short
full and down the leg side, Dhoni can't get any bat on it but the angle beats even the diving keeper
length, angled in and Chahal blocks confidently back to the bowler
length, angled in, Chahal was behind it nicely again, defends it to the leg side
length on middle, Dhoni swats it to long-on but has to refuse the single again
length outside off, Dhoni opens the face and guides it to third-man's right for two
length on middle, Dhoni swings to the leg side, gets a thick inside edge to squareleg but doesn't take a single again
length on off, Dhoni slaps it t long-on without much timing though and refuses the single again
length outside off, pushed to deep cover for one
length on middle, Chahal swings but doesn't get much on it as it trickles to long-on and Dhoni refuses the single again
full on middle, Dhoni swings again, doesn't get much on it and refuses the single
full outside off and finally, after refusing 7-8 singles, Dhoni connects, goes over cover, not usually his area but gets a lot of power behind that
length on middle, another swing but no timing back to the bowler
length on off, Dhoni skips down the wicket, swings and misses
length at the body, Dhoni swings as the ball hangs in the air in the direction of fine-leg off the top edge, falls short of the man but Dhoni decides against the run
length on middle, Dhoni swings, misses again but gets a legbye to point
length on middle, defended back to the bowler
length on the pads, misses the flick and is struck on the pad but it pitched outside leg
length, angled in, pushed to mid-on
length, angled in and clipped off the pads, past squareleg and a four to get off the mark
length outside off, pushed to point
full outside off, pushed back to the bowler
length on middle, hint of turn away, pushed to mid-on
length outside off, Stoinis has a flash and misses, Dhoni is quick to whip the bails off but his backfoot hadn't moved
length on middle, pushed to mid-on
length, angled in, pushed to midwicket for one

disaster for Australia! full on the pads, clipped straight to squareleg, there wasn't a run there, D'Arcy short yelled no as Stoinis took off for some reason and fell inches short as Chahal whipped the bails off at the non striker's end

struck on the pad and given! The ball angled in had Finch's number all summer and Bumrah hasn't forgotten as that was full, nipping back in, striking Finch quite low and it's umpires call even as Finch reviews. Two in two for India and suddenly India's total isn't looking so bad
length outside off and through him, beaten on the inside edge as he lunges forward to drive
length, angled in, kept a tad low but Maxwell adjusted well and also did well to defend it with a straight bat
length outside off and beaten again, this time on the outside edge as he pushed at it with his feet rooted to the crease
length, angled in, hurries on to Maxwell, who brings his bat down in time and defends to point
length outside off and Maxwell punches this through the covers, finding sublime timing out of nowhere to break the shackles
short at the body, doesn't quite come on, he is through the pull too early and has to take it on the body
length outside off, pushed to cover and they take off with the shot and it would have been very very tight with a direct hit at the non striker's end
length outside off, Maxwell slaps it over mid-off
length, angled in, pushed to midwicket
length, angled in and Maxwell is toying with the field here, as he shuffles across and tucks it away to short fine-leg's right for four
fuller and on middle this time but the same result as Maxwell clears his back leg and goes over the bowler's head
length, angled in, clipped away to deep squareleg's right for two
slower ball outside off, Short wait for it to arrive and defends to point with an open face
slower ball, Short turns the face too early and chips it to mid-on, the fielder comes charging in but it falls short despite a valiant dive
length outside off, defended off the backfoot
slower ball outside off, driven aerially and just wide of the cover fielder and it races to the fence after beating the inner-ring
length outside off, defended to cover
short, he rocks back and Maxwell is in a dangerous mood, Silences the crowd with a massive six over deep midwicket
length on the pads and he has picked that up over midwicket, somehow managing to time it on this surface when everyone around him is struggling
quicker, flatter one on middle, cut away  but straight to cover-point
full on middle, pushed to long-on
full on middle, pushed to long-on to finish a good over for Australia
length on off, sticks in the surface, defended
length outside off, Maxwell drags it to midwicket despite the lack of bounce
length, angled across, pushed back to the bowler
length on middle, pushed to long-on
quicker one on middle, pushed back to the bowler
length on middle, pushed to long-on
length outside off, slapped to long-off
length on middle, pushed past the diving bowler for one to long-on
length on off, pushed to cover
slow and wide outside off, Maxwell slaps it to cover
length outside off, Maxwell backs away and punches it to deep cover
length outside off, really really slow and Short rocks back and punches it to the deep cover fence
length, angled in, pushed to midwicket and they turn for an an easy couple
length outside off, pushed back to the bowler
direct hit and do we have another run-out? Maxwell chopped it to point and ran straight away, had to stretch at the non striker's end but made it easily
length outside off, defended to point
full on the pads, tucked away to deep squareleg
slog sweep and just short of the diving Rohit Sharma at deep midwicket
length on middle, pushed to midwicket
full outside off, enticing Maxwell to go big and Maxwell obliges with a massive hit over long-on
quicker one on middle, Maxwell goes back and punches it to long-off
length outside off, Short looks to cut, chops it to short third-man
quicker one outside off, slapped to deep cover
length, angled in, Maxwell waits for it to arrive and pushes it to squareleg
length, angled in, tucked away to deep squareleg
length on middle, quicker one, defended to cover
length on off, pushed to long-off
length, angled in, pushed to midwicket
quicker one on off, pushed to long-on
length outside off, it was the slider and Short cuts it behind point and places it beautifully
length on middle, sharp turn back in, inside edge to short fine-leg
full and angled in, tucked away to deep squareleg
another slider on middle, pushed to cover
length on middle, shuffles across and tucks it away to deep squareleg
full outside off, Maxwell lunges forward to blast it through the covers but can't get a decent amount of bat on it
length outside off, steered to third-man
short ball, Maxwell attempts to pull, is too early into hit and takes it on the grille of the helmet
full on middle, swatted to long-on
length, angled in, Short helps it along to fine-leg
length on middle, Maxwell makes room and swings wildly but misses
full outside off and brings up a brilliant fifty with a push to long-on
full down the leg side and he taps it on its head, reminiscent of Tendulkar
full on the legs again and Maxwell repeats the previous shot

tossed up outside off and Maxwell has holed out to long-off. Made him reach for it, there was a hint of turn as well as he ended up slicing it in the air and that ends what should be a match-winning innings, unless Australia blow it
length on off, defended to cover
full, drifting in, pushed to midwicket
length outside off, pushed to deep cover
full outside off, pushed to long-off
quicker one outside off, goes back to cut and is beaten for length
quicker one, angled across, this time he slaps it with a straighter bat, through the covers for four
full on the pads, clipped to midwicket
full on middle, hammered to long-on, through the bowler's hands
googly, not picked and Handscomb gets a lucky inside edge, past the stumps for a couple
length, angled in down the leg side and called wide
length on off, pushed to deep cover to bring up Australia's 1000

terrible mix up leads to Short's exit. It was clipped to fine-leg's left, a comfortable couple was on offer, Short turned for it but Handscomb decided against after initially calling him, there was a lot of hesitation with the two players nearly mid-pitch and it resulted in disaster for Australia
full on middle, mistimed dive inside edged to midwicket
full toss, angled in, pushed to mid-on
backs away, Umesh follows the batsman
length on middle, pushed to long-on

and they are only going to get louder! Is there a way back for India still? Turner shuffles across and looks to sweep him fine, not the best idea against a wicket-to-wicket bowler like Krunal, and he is cleaned up
length on middle, pushed to long-off
length, angled in, pushed to long-on
length on off, slapped past the bowler for another one down to long-off
full outside off, chipped past cover and down to long-off for another single
full outside off and caressed through the cover field, the fielder at long-off has to race across to his left and put in a slide to save two there
googly, plays back and steers it to short third-man with an open face
length on off, pushed to cover
quicker one on middle, pushed back
quicker one again, punched to long-off
googly again, he comes down the wicket and drags it to long-on
length outside off, early into the pull and misses. The pressure is suddenly on Australia
back away, Bumrah follows, gets a thick inside edge to deep squareleg
length on off, another swing and a miss and the pressure is mounting
length on middle, hurries on to him but manages to swat it to long-on

Australia are losing their way here! That was short on middle, Handscomb shuffled across to try and help it along, it hurried on to him, the top edge went high into the night sky but a calm Dhoni was under it and took it with ease
knocked him over with a searing yorker and for the first time in the match, India look to be firm favourites!
full ball outside off, dragged off the inside half to long-on. Mistimed slog
length on middle, and he has beaten deep backward squareleg to silence the crowd
yorker on middle, squeezes it out just past the bowler and they scamper two
full toss on the stumps, pushed to long-on but hit too hard to turn for two
full toss on off, and he pierces the cover field to turn the match Australia's way again
full on middle, just past the diving bowler and the lack of power behind the stroke ensures they get through for two and finish on the right side of this cliffhanger
